column5: We are packing Wed 5/23 and leaving 5/24 for a 14 day trip to Finlayson Resort and we will fish Finlayson, Marmion lake, and we are looking for reports, suggestions for other lakes in the Antikokan area for Walleye, Northern, Trout, and Perch. We also are looking for good eating (non-wormy) perch fishing so we can bring some home. All help is appreiciated and I will give reports for there from my laptop. Regards, Rich King
